name: "Robot Number Three" DVD
description:
A quirky computer animated film about the first space shuttle to leave our solar system, containing probes to explore an alien planet. It might sound geeky, but it's really just 12 minutes of smiles and wonder. The bargain of 2010.

"Some amazing animation, should deffo look out for more from this dude in the future," - Beth Offord

"A small step for animation but a giant leap for Pete Nicholson," - George Broad
